item.title: Hash chain, a data structure that grows with history
item.description: This article is the data structure and algorithm Advent Calendar 2019 Day 18 article. On the 17th day, @takilog wrote about “Fr√©chet distance calculation algorithm”. It was interesting, so I decided to study a little! On the 19th day, I’m in charge of @tsukasa__diary! Blockchain technology has been attracting attention in various fields such as cryptographic assets, traceability, and intellectual property management as tamper resistant technology. One of the things that play a major role in improving the security of such blockchains is the hash chain data structure.
